title: Lucid
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, American, Organic, Thai, Buffet, Beer/Wine, Take-out, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. An intimate lounge with an extensive array of vegan dishes. Drinks inclue a dairy-free Russian. Features live music Thur-Sat with a no-cover policy. Supports the local arts community which can be seen throughout the space, from floral art installations to burlesque, jazz to hip hop, culinary dishes to cocktail pairings and much more.
